description: This file defines the SerperTools class, a Python module that provides methods to interact with the Serper API for Google search, news, scholar, and webpage scraping functionalities. It includes request handling, API interaction, and logging.

classes.name: SerperTools
classes.description: A class that provides methods to perform various searches and webpage scraping using the Serper API, extending the Toolkit class.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the SerperTools instance with API key, location, language, number of results, and optional parameters.

methods.name: _make_request
methods.description: Handles making HTTP POST requests to the Serper API endpoints with proper headers and parameters.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a Google search query via the Serper API and returns the raw JSON response.

methods.name: search_news
methods.description: Performs a news search query via the Serper API and returns the raw JSON response.

methods.name: search_scholar
methods.description: Performs an academic paper search via Google Scholar through the Serper API and returns the raw JSON response.

methods.name: scrape_webpage
methods.description: Scrapes content from a webpage URL using the Serper scraping API and returns the content in JSON format.
